name: Andou N. Jennifer
text:
Everything is around money. Each question you ask, or something you mention will be part of restriction. when you think you are telling something because the lawyer can help you see clearly and tell you what to do, and how he will help you, but no, he will use this information to put more restriction on the contract.

At the end, if you ask too much questions, they send you an email to let you know they have too much work. You become a nuisance.

Please take time to ask questions. About everything. Read the contract and ask questions about each paragraphs.

resp.text: Though we cannot address specific details regarding your matter here for confidentiality reasons, we invite you to contact us directly to discuss your concerns. We thank you for consulting with us, and wish you well in your endeavors.

name: Ray Ray Ash
text:
Here is a lawyer that will work for you and not just the fees. Brian is very easy and knowledgeable in his fields of the law what ever those needs are. Mine's are traveling to other countries to be married and having the proper paperwork for both place of residents. Time change and I were late (1hr) but he waited with a smile. OMG I said to myself and he had great news to follow-up on my questions and some I didn't think about asking.
Who is Brian J. Bogdany???
Dedicated,Honor,Devoted,A Believer,Family Oriented,
Duty,Committed,Trustworthy
and a Joyful man to handle
your legal affairs.
Mr. ASH,R.,U.S.NAVY retired

resp.text: We greatly appreciate your confidence and your kind words. Thank you.

name: magda kruger
text: He is extremely good at what he does and one of the most helpful people I've ever met.

resp.text: Happy to be of service. Thank you.

name: Eric Davis
text: Mr. Bogdany was very helpful in our immigration case.

resp.text: We are happy you were satisfied with our work. Thank you so much.

name: Connor D. Grimshaw
text: Very knowledgeable and overall a nice person. Kind heart-ed and strong willed. I would not have a problem trusting them with my life.

name: Johnny Adams
text: Thanks for always taking the time to listen and give advice. Keep up the good work!

resp.text: We always appreciate speaking with you Johnny!

name: Jillian Yanes
text:
(Translated by Google) This is the best lawyer. Very professional, good prices; and onesto. I recommend it

(Original)
Este es el mejor abogado. Muy profesional, buenos precios; y onesto. Se lo recomiendo
